page.title: 04CHALFONT AREA CLUBS
page.content:
{Chalfont Football Club} was formed in 1926.It is sponsored by Highlight Windows. One evening we had a game against Watford to raise money for a local policeman who was badly wounded in a bomb blast.The club is also hoping to have another charity match against Q.P.R..The players are part-time professionals and come from all walks of life.
{Chalfont Cricket Club} Chalfont Park C.C. is situated next to Gerrards Cross Golf Club, which is on the A.413. It has a very good pitch and the pavilion has a bar in it. The club has a practice every Sunday for its various youth teams.
